title: What kinds of music awards has Kendrick Lamar won, and what did he win them for? - Quora

response.answer_text: BET AWARDSAOTY-2013Best collab for fuckin problems-2013Best new artist2013MVP of the year-2013Sweet 16 award for fuckin problems-2013Lyricist of the year-2012 and 2013Best male artist-2013 SOUL TRAIN AWARDSAOTY-2013 ASCAP & SOUL MUSIC AWARDSVanguard award-2013 MOBO AWARDSBest international artist-2013 MTV JAPANBest hip hop video-2013 The one he should have one though was the grammy for hip hop AOTY. Macklemore stole that shit and even he knew it.
